common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"user_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a user."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by(depends on different APIs) partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token,  user_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm."}]
define: Get detailed performance data for individual post Shopee Video. There is at least a one-day delay.
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

A unique identifier for Shopee videos.

","name":"post_id","sample":"YwOo_gZqCACXbM0UAAAAAA==","type":"string","required":"True","key":"DQAQEBt"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"KXWjtPs"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dkwkwHB"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"2af852cd-7420-4714-b7cd-33317f6fe548","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RtjByFz"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"nSNPKRa","children":[{"description":"

Video post detail informations you are querying.

","name":"video_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"iZiJmZ","children":[{"description":"

A unique identifier for Shopee videos.

","name":"post_id","sample":"YwOo_gZqCACXbM0UAAAAAA==","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MCerHih"},{"description":"

The time when the video post to Shopee Video.

","name":"post_time","sample":"1761188662147","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"KaMBFew"},{"description":"

Video play url.

","name":"video_url","sample":"https://down-bs-id.vod.susercontent.com/c3/50007225/201/A3oxONdWALgpg8thEbEBACc.mp4","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FiDSmjW"},{"description":"

Cover image url of the Shopee Video.

","name":"cover_image_url","sample":"https://down-sp-id.vod.susercontent.com/c3/50007225/201/A3oyOUXSAFAbg8thIfYBBgAn.jpg","type":"string","required":null,"key":"kETYxTN"},{"description":"

Description of the Shopee Video.

","name":"caption","sample":"#tt Tt1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KxCcPB"},{"description":"

Video duration time in millisecond.

","name":"duration","sample":"6866","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"sfRxmKb"},{"description":"

Number of products linked with the Shopee Video.

","name":"related_item_count","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"SsFWGYF"}]},{"description":"

Overall performance data of the video you are querying.

","name":"video_performance","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"inGMHNn","children":[{"description":"

Amount of views from the video.

","name":"views","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"FssnbzY"},{"description":"

Total likes from the video.

","name":"likes","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"CNRyYM"},{"description":"

Total comments from the video.

","name":"comments","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"DaDcmBi"},{"description":"

Total shares from the video.

","name":"shares","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"GmCQMdp"},{"description":"

Amount of new followers from the Video.

","name":"followers_growth","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"trsHWib"},{"description":"

Amount of product orders from the video.

","name":"placed_orders","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ypesPmX"},{"description":"

Amount of product sales from the video.

","name":"placed_sales","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"aWfhfDd"},{"description":"

Buyers of the products in the video.

","name":"unique_buyers","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"EtQFYZF"},{"description":"

Amount of products sold from the video/amount of views from the video.

","name":"conversion_rate","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"hTshfip"},{"description":"

Amount of products sold from the video.

","name":"sold_items","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"AAWcxW"},{"description":"

The product click value of orders for item.

","name":"product_clicks","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"dkMWpfk"},{"description":"

The product click rate value of orders for item.

","name":"product_click_rate","sample":"2.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"GCChyfS"},{"description":"

Amount of product sales from the video/amount of product orders from the video.

","name":"sales_per_order","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"pMRHWrP"},{"description":"

Amount of product sales from the video/amount of buyers from the video.

","name":"sales_per_buyer","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"WmDiTNb"}]}]}]}
